Dragonkeeper: Shall I explain about feeding dragons?
No, I already know. Yes, tell me.[end1]

This is about food that relates to the personality of each dragon.
Eating weapons will make them become attack-oriented. They'll attack enemies like wild beasts. Eating armor will make them timid. They will stay away from the enemy and attack from afar. Dragons like sweet things. But if you give them too many they'll become spoiled. When that happens, give them bitter things that they really hate.
It's hard for spoiled dragons to leave the presence of humans.
Generally, books will make them smarter. When they're smart, their magic will be much stronger. These are the bsicrs.[end][end]
